page.title: 15CHANGING TIMES IN MAPPERLEY
page.content: This area has changed.In 1945 Penarth Gardens was Nottingham Brickyard.Now it is housing.Woodthorpe Park used to have a railway running through it. School today is different than in 1945 but the games we play are similar.We still have Rounders and swimming but we have computers,the most modern thing today.In 1945 black and white televisions were coming out.Today we take colour televisions for granted. The most modern clothes today are light colouredtrousers,baggy jeans elasticated at the ankle,which are different from 1945.Modern things then were midi lengths and flares.Family life today is much easier than 1945. When we have spare time we can play, but in 1945 they had to help in the home,scrubbing doorsteps and Monday was washday.But family life was very close. R.Neill,B.Kaur,V.Williams.
